attributes.action: admit that the EU Treaty should be scrapped immediately following the Irish "NO" vote.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown seems to be willing to sign the EU Treaty, even though the Treaty should have been rejected under EU rules following the Irish NO vote.  The British public should also be granted an immediate referendum as we were originally promised by the Labour Government in their manifesto.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
